pathAssistantSteps.info:
• ‘Active’ indicates that the Giving Cause is not available on QUT Givings webpage for public to donate. However, the system will continue to process recurring donations for the cause.
  • An active donation cause may be also available to Staff for internal giving.
• ‘Archive’ indicates that the Giving Cause has been discontinued and none of the donation records are active for receiving the donations.

• 'Define’ indicates that you have identified a giving cause to be published on QUT Giving Website or Staff Connect
  • Use ‘Notes’ to record relevant information to help you manage the important Information like approvals etc. Use the ‘Activity’ panel to record your interactions and track tasks.
  • Record the documents that have been created with links to where they are stored under the 'Documents’ tab.
• ‘Published’ indicates that the Giving Cause is available on QUT Givings webpage for public to donate.
